hospital_info.name: SuperHealth Medical Center
hospital_info.mission: Zero wait times, fixed pricing, patient-first experience

operational_hours.lab_services: Monday-Friday 6:00 AM - 8:00 PM, Weekends 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM
operational_hours.radiology: Monday-Friday 7:00 AM - 9:00 PM, Weekends 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM

general_policies.title: Arrival Policy
general_policies.description: Patients should arrive 15-30 minutes before scheduled appointments for check-in and insurance verification.

general_policies.title: ID Requirements
general_policies.description: Valid photo ID required for all visits. Acceptable forms include driver's license, state ID, passport, or military ID.

general_policies.title: Insurance Verification
general_policies.description: Insurance cards must be presented at each visit. We verify coverage and obtain authorizations as needed.

general_policies.title: Cancellation Policy
general_policies.description: Appointments must be cancelled at least 24 hours in advance to avoid cancellation fees.

general_policies.title: Emergency Triage
general_policies.description: Emergency patients are triaged based on severity of condition, not arrival time.

general_policies.title: Visitor Policy
general_policies.description: One support person allowed per patient. Additional restrictions may apply in certain departments.

general_policies.title: Payment Policy
general_policies.description: Copays and deductibles due at time of service. Payment plans available for larger amounts.

best_times.emergency: Consistently low wait times due to severity-based triage
best_times.urgent_care: Early morning (7-9 AM) and late evening (9-11 PM)
best_times.primary_care: Mid-morning (10 AM-12 PM) and mid-afternoon (2-4 PM)
best_times.specialists: First appointments of the day or right after lunch
best_times.lab_services: Early morning (6-8 AM) and late afternoon (6-8 PM)
best_times.radiology: Mid-morning (9-11 AM) and early evening (7-9 PM)
